description:
When people are facing criminal allegations at the investigative phase of a case they require aggressive legal assistance. Once they have been indicted or charged criminally the need for legal representation is heightened. Often, the client has made statements to the investigating agencies and the attorney has to make up for lost time. The law office of Patrick M. Farrell Co., L.P.A., and its dedicated team, understand the emotional afflictions that accompany criminal allegations and/or charges. We have stood by our clients for more than 30 years and provide them the counseling and representation they require, treating them like family, so that they know they are receiving the utmost professional representation as we help them navigate the complicated legal process.
Attorney Patrick M. Farrell has tried a wide range of cases in the U.S. Federal Court and is admitted to practice in both the Northern and Southern District Courts in the State of Ohio. Attorney Patrick M. Farrell has tried a wide range of cases throughout the state of Ohio including capital murder which resulted in an acquittal. He has represented individuals for murder, rape, felonious assault, aggravated robbery, aggravated burglary, aggravated vehicular homicide, felony drug possession, felony domestic violence, weapon charges, and other felonies, as well as misdemeanor offenses, including OVI, DUS, drug possession, domestic violence, menacing offenses, stalking and traffic offenses.

Attorney Patrick M. Farrell’s vast experience includes being a former prosecutor which provides him with invaluable insight as to the strengths and weaknesses of the cases that are brought against our clients. The law office of Patrick M. Farrell fully and completely investigates each and every case so as to assist in developing defenses on behalf of our clients and help them achieve the optimal outcome to their satisfaction. His trial skills have resulted in acquittals in a broad range of criminal offenses and have also provided resolution as a result of negotiated plea agreements to the benefit of our clients. These same skills have resulted in many civil settlements, some of which have exceeded $1 million.

Our law firm offers free consultations. We accept payment plans to ease the burden of the expenses and accept debit and credit card forms of payment for the convenience of our clients.
